name: .QRP File Extension
summary: Learn about .QRP files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A QRP file is a report created by QuickReport, a program that allows users to design and create reports. It contains report components, such as graphics, text, tables, and layout information. QRP files can be generated programmatically by using the QuickReport API.

content: QRP files are the primary files used by QuickReport and are saved in a proprietary format. However, QRP files may be converted into other file types in QuickReport, including .HTML, .JPG, .PDF, .XML, and .CSV.
NOTE: QuickReport is written in Delphi code and is integrated into Delphi and C++ Builder IDEs. The software is available in Standard and Pro editions.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Embarcadero Delphi with QBS QuickReport or QRDesign plug-in
